name: rePLACE
description:
Made for Global Game Jam 2022.

Install instructions
  • Browser: just hit the run button above!
  • Windows: unzip rePLACE-win.zip, then run rePLACE.exe. If you see a Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warning, click "More info", then "Run anyway". We promise we're not trying to hack you. Not intentionally, at least.
  • Mac: unzip rePLACE-mac.zip, then run the rePLACE app. If you get a "malicious code" warning, right-click on the app and choose "Open", then click "Open" in the popup  menu. Rest assured our code is delicious, not malicious.
